vulnerable.commit_message:
FTP: Fix buffer overflow in PORT parser, reported by Aaron Esau

Signed-off-by: Joachim Nilsson <troglobit@gmail.com>
vulnerable.cve_desc: An unauthenticated stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability in common.c's handle_PORT in uftpd FTP server versions 2.10 and earlier can be abused to cause a crash and could potentially lead to remote code execution.
